#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int i,t,n,a;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        for(i=n,a=0;i>1;i/=2)
        a+=i/2;
        printf("%d\n",a);

        for(i=n,a=0;i>1;i/=3)
        a+=i/3;
        printf("%d\n",a);

        for(i=n,a=0;i>1;i/=5)
        a+=i/5;
        printf("%d\n",a);
    }
    return 0;
}
